titles.title: A bill to amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to clarify the tariff rates for carpet cleaners and parts thereof imported into the United States.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/25/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide for the duty-free treatment of carpet cleaners and carpet cleaner parts.
